ai-patthana17.31:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.31:0.3_0: There is immediately effective, inviting inspection, relevant, so that scared.
ai-patthana17.31:1.1_0: Attacking a corrupt heart, not of corrupting mind, nor a corrupt magistrating the teachings. Not wearing away, they don’t keep it connected.
ai-patthana17.31:2.1_0: One whose nature is not corrupted, nor are there for the corruption of nature.
ai-patthana17.31:3.1_0: One whose teachings is not corrupted, nor are they defiled.
